attributes.action: put pressure on the EU to improve care standards for children and to outlaw the tying up of children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To request that the Prime Minister applies pressure on the EU to improve standards of care within state run institutions,In Turkey and Romania in relation to undercover filming.The filming showed overwhelming treatment of the children and Adults.The children are deprived of any stimulation and often self harm,then staff bind the children for hours at a time. One deaf and blind toddler was left to eat his nappy, another boy kept in a box and they believed he was hyperactive, a girl had been tied up daily, on to a bed for 10 years. The children are fed lying down in cots and the conditions are overcrowded and stenching of faeces, this is all evident through the undercover filming that was done by a team who were joined by the Duchess of York.Turkey and Romania claim they have little funds for training but are reluctant to accept help. The E.U should have firm negotiations and ensure the staff are trained at least to be able to ensure the children’s basic needs being met.
